A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I so much wanted to like this movie\, but I just can't. It is nice for the visuals and music\, but everything else is just objectivly bad. Too much humor\, many plotholes around the Force\, the original trilogy\, the force awakens\, in the movie itself etc. So much in this movie makes no sense. I recommend watching AngryJoe's and Pewdiepie's Reviews of the Movie\, they sum it up well. So disappointed.
